pages.text: $(bred)Pole Vaulting Zombie$() holds a pole and is ready to jump to you and eat your brain.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)50$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It will jump to $(bred)rapidly reach$() its target when distance is suitable and $(l)avoid damage when jumping$(), when pole lost it will slow down to $(l)Normal$() speed.
